COMMIT.MESSAGE: Unmute HdfsSearchableSnapshotsIT (#122992) https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/pull/122044 solved (temporarily) the issue with HDFS libraries not being compatible with JDK 24. This PR unmutes a test with the same issues Solves https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/122024
